documents.name: LFG Offer Stack
documents.content:
# LFG Offer Stack

## Free Community
- Top of funnel
- Free Skool access
- Community-driven growth

## Premium ($100/mo)
- Weekly group calls
- Playbooks & templates
- BackPak CRM access
- Monthly workshops

## VIP ($1,000/mo)
- 100-day accelerator
- 2x/week coaching calls
- 1:1 Slack access to Dan
- Quarterly retreats

## 12-Month Program ($12K)
- Daily coaching Mon-Sat
- Full system build
- All retreats included
- White-glove onboarding

documents.name: Brand Voice Guide
documents.content:
# LFG Brand Voice

## Tone
- Direct but warm
- Confident, not arrogant
- Anti-bro marketing
- Slightly contrarian
- Fun, not corporate

## We Say
- "Simple systems that work"
- "Build once, profit forever"
- "Community over courses"
- "Lifestyle first, revenue follows"

## We Never Say
- "Limited spots remaining" (fake scarcity)
- "This is your last chance"
- "Crushing it" / "Killing it"
- "6-figure" / "7-figure" hype

## Writing Style
- Short sentences
- One idea per paragraph
- Stories over stats
- Show, don't tell

documents.name: Ideal Client Avatar
documents.content:
# LFG Ideal Client

## Demographics
- Age: 35-52
- Current revenue: $5K-$40K/month
- Experience: Established coach/consultant
- Platform: Primarily Instagram, some YouTube

## Psychographics
- Tired of the hustle
- Values freedom over status
- Wants systems that work without them
- Anti-bro marketing mindset
- Family/lifestyle focused

## Pain Points
- Trading time for money
- Launch fatigue
- Client acquisition rollercoaster
- Tech overwhelm
- Inconsistent revenue

## Desires
- Predictable monthly revenue
- 4-day workweeks
- Community-based business model
- Simple, elegant systems
- Impact + income

notionDocs.name: Content Intelligence Report â€” Feb 2026
notionDocs.content:
# Executive Summary
The coaching and community-based business space is experiencing significant shifts in early 2026. Key trends include:
- Long-form content is returning â€” platforms are favoring 2-3 minute videos over ultra-short clips
- AI integration is table stakes â€” but authenticity is the differentiator
- Community > courses â€” the market has firmly shifted toward membership models
- "FaceTime" content wins â€” casual, conversational content outperforms polished productions
- SEO on social matters more than ever â€” Gen Z uses TikTok/IG instead of Google

# ðŸ“º Part 1: YouTube Research

## What's Working on YouTube
1. Long-form content is back â€” YouTube is rewarding 10-20 minute videos again. Shorts drive discovery, long-form converts.
2. Consistency beats virality â€” VidIQ research confirms 3-4x/week posting outperforms sporadic "viral attempts."
3. YouTube SEO is critical â€” Search-driven content compounds over time.
4. Educational "edutainment" â€” 31.3% seek how-to videos, 29.8% want educational content.

## ðŸ”¥ Hot Topics in Coaching/Skool Space

# ðŸ“¸ Part 2: Instagram Research

## Major Platform Shifts (2026)
1. Video dominates â€” First posts in feed are now Reels. Algorithm heavily favors video.
2. Bigger carousels â€” Now up to 20 images/videos per carousel. Photo dumps thriving.
3. 3-minute Reels â€” New feature allows longer storytelling. Early adopters have advantage.
4. Trial Reels â€” Test content with non-followers before publishing.
5. 5 links in bio â€” No more Linktree necessity.

## Reels Formats That Perform
- Video Memes â€” Remixing trending audio with text overlay â†’ Reach & relatability
- POV Videos â€” "When you..." scenarios â†’ Engagement & shares
- "Send this to..." â€” Prompts sharing â†’ Viral reach
- Behind-the-scenes â€” Raw, unpolished â†’ Trust & authenticity
- Talking head (simple) â€” Just you + text overlay â†’ Authority

# ðŸŽ¯ Strategic Recommendations

## Your Unique Advantages
1. 3x Skool Games Winner â€” Rare, verifiable credibility
2. Community-first approach â€” Not course-bro, not webinar-hustler
3. Anti-bro marketing stance â€” Resonates with mature audience tired of manipulation
4. Target demo (35-52, $5-40K/mo coaches) â€” Underserved middle market

## Content Pillars
1. Community Strategy â€” How to build, engage, retain members
2. Anti-Bro Marketing â€” Ethical selling, authentic growth
3. Skool Mastery â€” Platform-specific tactics, Skool Games insights
4. Lifestyle Business Design â€” Sustainable income without burnout
5. Behind-the-Scenes â€” Your journey, wins, lessons

# ðŸ“º Top 10 YouTube Video Ideas

# ðŸ“¸ Top 10 Instagram Ideas
